Question: According to police reports, this person refused to stop blocking the front entrance of the store and let customers pass.
Hints: When King was shot, this person was in the parking lot one floor below.
This person took a key role in the scandal caused by comedic actor Michael Richards' racially-charged comments in November 2006.
Clinton awarded this person the Presidential Medal of Freedom, the nation's highest honor bestowed on civilians in August 2000.
